attributes.action: Those that feel cheated by campaign of lies should be allowed to vote again
attributes.additional_details:
The vote out campaigners manage to convince a vast number of people that NHS would be saved with the '350 million'. It was a lie and those that deeply care for the NHS got simply cheated by Nigel Farage and his team. http://m.huffpost.com/uk/entry/uk_576d0aa3e4b08d2c5638fc17?edition=uk

This lie could have swayed those undecided who now feel cheated and lied to and wish to express their disappointment and call for another referendum.
attributes.background: Those that opted to vote out in the recent referendum and feel they were missinformed and lied to by the vote out campaigners, should be allowed to vote again. NHS wont get the promissed 350 million! You were lied to, what else didn't they tell you?!?! If you feel you made a mistake, sign!
